reviewText:
Loved this Edition of the PLAYMATE VIDEO CALENDAR. These early ones are rare and now hard to find. Being it on VHS, not a good way to showcase these beauties and indeed they are beauties!!
I loved all of them and my highlights in this edition were, FAWNA MACLAREN, TAWNNI CABLE, AVA FABIAN, JENNIFER JACKSON, THE
VAN BREESCHOOTEN TWINS, SHANNON LONG.
Going to get this one on LASERDISC, since it never was released on DVD or higher format. It will not dupe over to a blank DVD either. It has
a copyguard on it and since Hugh Hefner's death, I doubt these VHS will ever be released on DVD format, at least ones prior to 1995.

** PLAYMATES ARE~
* FAWNA MACLAREN
* LAURA RICHMOND
* TAWNNI CABLE
* LAURIE WOOD
* AVA FABIAN
* PIA REYES
* EMILY ARTH
* SIMONE EDEN
* JENNIFER JACKSON
* VAN BREESCHOOTEN TWINS
* SHANNON LONG
* KIMBERLY CONRAD

Laurie Wood & Shannon Long's breasts are reason enough to check it out.

Tawni Cable was always one of my favorites so if you don't have her video centerfold, she's also a good one to check out.

Overall only average but it has it's moments.

Playboy 1990 Playmate Video Calendar is one hour and sixteen minutes. The video does not go by the month that the Playmates are listed in Playboy. A good example is Kimberley Conrad who is Miss December in this video and Miss October in the 1989 Video Calendar. Basically you have twelve pretty Playmates who at least seven who are not nude or not nude for a very long time. Here are the following Playmates in order of the calendar.

Fawna MacLaren\Miss January (Playboy's 35th Anniversary Playmate)-At the end of her introduction, full nudity is shown
Laura Richmond\Miss February-Topless first half with brief shots of nudity. All clothes second half.
Tawnni Cable\Miss March-Mainly topless, a few quick moments of her being nude
Laurie Wood\Miss April-Just topless in her segment
Emily Arth\Miss May-Totally nude at times early, nude at pool scene
Pia Reyes\Miss June-Nudity is shown in very quick takes and most o f the times is hard to see do to the bright lights
Ava Fabian\Miss July-Just topless at times
Simone Eden\Miss August-Topless first half, nude second half
Jennifer Jackson\Miss September-Shown briefly nude early on and topless at the end
Van Breeschooten Twins\Misses October-Shown nude at different times in their segment
Shannon Long\Miss November-Topless at times early on, then full nudity at pool segment, nudity at the end
Kimberley Conrad\Miss December (Playmate of the Year 1989)-Nudity is all to brief.

Overall this was not a very good Playmate Video Calendar. Playboy 1990 Playmate Video Calendar gets a C-.
